history.content: I don't think there is a way to officially audit a class. The CS 70 website is accessible for everyone, so you can go over the discussion sheets and homework. You can also join CS 70 Piazza (click on "join another class" under the classes menu, search for CS 70, and click on "join as student"). The discussion and lecture links and recordings will be posted either on Piazza or the website, so you can attend them like any other student.

I was planning on taking CS 70 over the summer (so I can declare since I'm currently a 2nd year) and I wanted to see if it was possible to audit it this semester so I can start getting exposure to the material to feel more prepared to take it over the summer. I emailed the professors, but have yet to hear back. How can I audit this class? What is the process like?
history.subject: CS 70 Audit?
